instructions.reason_for_call:
You have a couple requests.
For order #W5056519, you want to change the address to be the same as order #W8277957. For order #W5056519, you want to  exchange Makeup Kit {'skin tone': 'light', 'kit size': 'professional', 'brand': 'Brand B'} to {'skin tone': 'dark', 'brand': 'Brand A'}. Finally, you want to cancel order #W5995614 because you ordered by mistake.
instructions.known_info: Your name is Yara Muller and your email is yara.muller9246@example.com.

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hello, I have a few requests regarding my orders. For order #W5056519, I want to change the shipping address to be the same as the one on order #W8277957. Also, for the same order #W5056519, I want to exchange the Makeup Kit I ordered. It is currently the one with skin tone 'light', kit size 'professional', and brand 'Brand B', but I want to change it to a Makeup Kit with skin tone 'dark' and brand 'Brand A'. Lastly, I want to cancel order #W5995614 because I ordered it by mistake. Can you help me with these?
